TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ClaimsIdentity extends System.Object implements class System.Security.Principal.IIdentity

summary.span: 代表宣告式身分識別。

span.span: Represents a claims-based identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是宣告式身分識別的具體實作; 也就是身分識別所述的宣告集合。The class is a concrete implementation of a claims-based identity; that is, an identity described by a collection of claims. 宣告是由描述屬性，向右，簽發者或某些其他品質該實體的實體有關的陳述式。A claim is a statement about an entity made by an issuer that describes a property, right, or some other quality of that entity. 這種實體稱為宣告主體。Such an entity is said to be the subject of the claim. 宣告由類別。A claim is represented by the class. 所包含的宣告描述的實體，代表對應的身分識別，而且可用來決定授權和驗證。The claims contained in a describe the entity that the corresponding identity represents, and can be used to make authorization and authentication decisions. 宣告型存取模型有許多優於傳統完全依賴角色的存取模型。A claims-based access model has many advantages over more traditional access models that rely exclusively on roles. 例如，宣告可以提供更豐富的身分識別，它們代表，並且可以以更特定的方式進行評估授權或驗證相關資訊。For example, claims can provide much richer information about the identity they represent and can be evaluated for authorization or authentication in a far more specific manner. 從.NET Framework 4.5 開始，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 和宣告式身分識別已完全整合至.NET Framework。Beginning with .NET Framework 4.5, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) and claims-based identity have been fully integrated into the .NET Framework. 這表示現在代表.NET Framework 中的身分識別的許多類別衍生自並描述其屬性，透過宣告的集合。This means that many classes that represent an identity in the .NET Framework now derive from and describe their properties through a collection of claims. 這點不同於舊版的.NET Framework 中，在其中實作這些類別直接介面。This is different from previous versions of the .NET Framework, in which, these classes implemented the interface directly. 可以透過存取的說明身分識別的宣告集合屬性。The collection of claims that describe the identity can be accessed through the property. 類別提供多種方法來尋找和修改宣告，並完全支援 language-integrated query (LINQ)。The class provides several methods for finding and modifying claims and fully supports language integrated queries (LINQ). 在 應用程式程式碼物件通常會在透過物件; 比方說，所傳回的主體。In application code, objects are typically accessed through objects; for example, the principal returned by . > [!NOTE] > 類別具有以及屬性。The class has a property as well. 在大部分的情況下，您應該存取使用者的宣告，透過集合而非透過集合。In the majority of cases you should access the user's claims through the collection rather than through the collection. 您必須存取個別的宣告只在其中主體會包含一個以上的情況下和您要評估或修改特定的身分識別。You will need to access the claims of an individual only in the cases where the principal contains more than one and you need to evaluate or modify a specific identity. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要新增或移除來自宣告集合中，呼叫端必須具有完全信任。To add or remove claims from the collection, a caller must have full trust. 在宣告式模型中，屬性和方法會實作藉由評估身分識別所包含的宣告。In the claims-based model, the property and the method are implemented by evaluating the claims contained by an identity. 基底實作宣告式模型中的所提供的屬性和方法。The base implementations in the claims-based model are provided by the property and the method. 和屬性可讓您指定應該用來評估執行這些作業時，依身分識別所含宣告的宣告類型。The and properties enable you to specify a claim type that should be used to evaluate the claims contained by the identity when performing these operations. 透過支援委派案例和屬性。Delegation scenarios are supported through the and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的屬性值，指派類別從提供給建構函式。The following table shows the property value assignments for an instance of the class from the provided to the constructor. | 屬性Property | 值Value | | -------- | ----- | ||如果值`other.Actor`屬性不是`null`，則`other.Actor`複製和指派; 否則即為`null`。If the value of the `other.Actor` property isn't `null`, the `other.Actor` is cloned and assigned; otherwise, `null`.| ||`other.AuthenticationType` 屬性的值。The value of the `other.AuthenticationType` property.| ||`other.BootstrapContext` 屬性的值。The value of the `other.BootstrapContext` property.| ||`List`的宣告，如果有的話，在`other.Claims`屬性。The `List` of claims, if any, in the `other.Claims` property.| ||`other.Label` 屬性的值。The value of the `other.Label` property.| ||`other.NameClaimType` 屬性的值。The value of the `other.NameClaimType` property.| ||`other.RoleClaimType` 屬性的值。The value of the `other.RoleClaimType` property.| ||如果`other.CustomSerializationData`未`null`，`other.CustomSerializationData`複製和指派; 否則即為`null`。If `other.CustomSerializationData` isn't `null`, `other.CustomSerializationData` is cloned and assigned; otherwise, `null`.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.Actor`屬性，否則`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Actor` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||值`identity.AuthenticationType`() 使用屬性。The value of the `identity.AuthenticationType` () property is used.| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.BootStrapContext`屬性，否則`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.BootStrapContext` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||如果`identity`會依從，從宣告`identity`加入至新的執行個體，否則為空集合。If `identity` is assignable from , the claims from `identity` are added to the new instance; otherwise, an empty collection.| ||**注意︰** 存取時，值屬性會根據傳回的值屬性。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the value of the property.| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.Label`屬性，否則`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Label` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||如果`identity`不是依從，不是`null`，且屬性不是`null`; 名稱宣告新增至新的執行個體使用的值屬性。If `identity` is not assignable from , is not `null`, and has an property that is not `null`; a name claim is added to the new instance using the value of the property. **注意：** 存取時，值屬性會傳回根據而集合。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the and the collection.| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.NameClaimType`屬性，則為，用。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.NameClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.RoleClaimType`屬性，則為，用。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.RoleClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.Actor`屬性，否則`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Actor` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||`authenticationType` 參數。The `authenticationType` parameter. 如果`authenticationType`參數是`null`或空字串，值`identity.AuthenticationType`() 使用屬性。If the `authenticationType` parameter is `null` or an empty string, the value of the `identity.AuthenticationType` () property is used.| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.BootStrapContext`屬性，否則`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.BootStrapContext` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||初始化從`claims`參數。Initialized from the `claims` parameter. 如果`identity`會依從，從宣告`identity`新增至新的執行個體，再藉由指定`claims`參數。If `identity` is assignable from , the claims from `identity` are added to the new instance before those specified by the `claims` parameter.| ||**注意︰** 存取時，值屬性會根據傳回的值屬性。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the value of the property.| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.Label`屬性，否則`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Label` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||如果`identity`不是依從，不是`null`，且屬性不是`null`; 名稱宣告新增至新的執行個體使用的值屬性。If `identity` is not assignable from , is not `null`, and has an property that is not `null`; a name claim is added to the new instance using the value of the property. **注意：** 存取時，值屬性會傳回根據而集合。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the and the collection.| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.NameClaimType`屬性，則為，用。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.NameClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.RoleClaimType`屬性，則為，用。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.RoleClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.|

summary.span: 從指定的 ，使用指定的宣告、驗證類型、名稱宣告型別，以及角色宣告類型，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified using the specified claims, authentication type, name claim type, and role claim type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.Actor`屬性，否則`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Actor` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||`authenticationType` 參數。The `authenticationType` parameter. 如果`authenticationType`參數是`null`或空字串，值`identity.AuthenticationType`() 使用屬性。If the `authenticationType` parameter is `null` or an empty string, the value of the `identity.AuthenticationType` () property is used.| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.BootStrapContext`屬性，否則`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.BootStrapContext` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||初始化從`claims`參數。Initialized from the `claims` parameter. 如果`identity`會依從，從宣告`identity`新增至新的執行個體，再藉由指定`claims`參數。If `identity` is assignable from , the claims from `identity` are added to the new instance before those specified by the `claims` parameter.| ||**注意︰** 存取時，值屬性會根據傳回的值屬性。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the value of the property.| ||如果`identity`會依從，值`identity.Label`屬性，否則`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Label` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||如果`identity`不是依從，不是`null`，且屬性不是`null`; 名稱宣告新增至新的執行個體使用的值屬性。If `identity` is not assignable from , is not `null`, and has an property that is not `null`; a name claim is added to the new instance using the value of the property. **注意：** 存取時，值屬性會傳回根據而集合。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the and the collection.| ||`nameType` 參數的值。The value of the `nameType` parameter. 不過，如果的值`nameType`參數是`null`或空字串與`identity`會依從的值`identity.NameClaimType`屬性，則為，用。However, if the value of the `nameType` parameter is `null` or an empty string and `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.NameClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.| ||`roleClaimType` 參數的值。The value of the `roleClaimType` parameter. 不過，如果值`roleClaimType`參數是`null`或空字串和身分識別會依從的值`identity.RoleClaimType`屬性，則為，用。However, if the value of the `roleClaimType` parameter is `null` or an empty string and identity is assignable from , the value of the `identity.RoleClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.|

summary.span: 取得或設定已授與委派權限之呼叫方的識別。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity of the calling party that was granted delegation rights.

value.span: 獲得委派權限的呼叫方。

span.span: The calling party that was granted delegation rights.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以存取目前的呼叫，以遞迴方式檢查導致委派鏈結屬性。An application can access the delegation chain that led to the current call, by recursively examining the property. 可以透過存取語彙基元，其代表委派呼叫屬性。The token on whose behalf the call is being delegated can be accessed through the property.

summary.span: 將單一宣告加入至這個宣告識別。

span.span: Adds a single claim to this claims identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宣告會檢查與此主體是否不同於宣告身分識別，方法叫用這個宣告識別做為建立正確的主體中的新宣告的參數。The claim is examined and if the subject is different than this claims identity, the method is invoked with this claims identity as the parameter to create a new claim with the correct subject. 這個方法有`SecurityCritical`屬性套用至哪些實體可以將宣告新增至身分識別的控制項。This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can add claims to the identity. 進一步向下管道，會做出授權決策基礎上會出現在宣告集合。Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the collection.

summary.span: 取得或設定用來建立此宣告識別的權杖。

span.span: Gets or sets the token that was used to create this claims identity.
The bootstrap context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基礎物件是的執行個體類別。The underlying object is an instance of the class. 設定`saveBootstrapContext`上的屬性[ <identityConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)或[ <Securitytokenhandlerconfiguration>> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md)若要指定權杖是否用來產生組態檔中的項目應該保留在屬性。Set the `saveBootstrapContext` attribute on either the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) or the [<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md) element in a configuration file to specify whether the token used to generate the should be preserved in the property. 如果屬性不是`null`，應用程式可以透過屬性和方法的存取，原始的語彙基元，它所產生的宣告類別。If the property is not `null`, applications can access the original token and the claims it produced through the properties and methods of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Claims As IEnumerable(Of Claim)

summary.span: 取得與此宣告識別相關聯的宣告。

span.span: Gets the claims associated with this claims identity.

value.span: 與這個宣告識別相關聯的宣告集合。

span.span: The collection of claims associated with this claims identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合可能包含的項目`null`。The collection may contain entries that are `null`. 所包含的宣告集合基本上會描述由實體。The claims contained in the collection essentially describe the entity that is represented by the . 宣告描述的屬性和實體所擁有的權限，並可以由應用程式，以做出有關驗證和授權檢查。The claims describe the properties and rights possessed by the entity and can be examined by applications to make decisions about authentication and authorization. > [!NOTE] > 類別具有以及屬性。The class has a property as well. 在大部分的情況下，您應該存取使用者的宣告，透過集合而非透過集合。In the majority of cases you should access the user's claims through the collection rather than through the collection. 您必須存取個別的宣告只在其中主體會包含一個以上的情況下和您要評估或修改特定的身分識別。You will need to access the claims of an individual only in the cases where the principal contains more than one and you need to evaluate or modify a specific identity.

span.span: The claim to remove.

summary.span: 嘗試從宣告識別移除宣告。

span.span: Attempts to remove a claim from the claims identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很可能無法移除宣告，因為它不屬於身分識別。It is possible that the claim cannot be removed because it is not owned by the identity. 比方說，這就是主體所擁有的角色宣告的情況。For example, this would be the case for role claims that are owned by the principal. 不同於方法，這個方法會傳回布林值，指出是否已移除宣告，擲回例外狀況，如果無法移除宣告Unlike the method, which returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the claim has been removed, throws an exception if the claim could not be removed 物件參考所比對指定的宣告 ()。The specified claim is matched by object reference (). 這個方法有`SecurityCritical`屬性套用至哪些實體可以移除身分識別的宣告的控制項。This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can remove claims from the identity. 進一步向下管道，會做出授權決策基礎上會出現在宣告集合。Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the collection.

span.span: The claim cannot be removed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RoleClaimType As String
public: property System::String ^ RoleClaimType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在此宣告識別中的宣告，取得將被解譯為 .NET Framework 角色的宣告型別。

span.span: Gets the claim type that will be interpreted as a .NET Framework role among the claims in this claims identity.
The role claim type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 角色宣告類型是宣告類型 ()，用於評估此身分識別時方法。The role claim type is the claim type () that is used when evaluating this identity for the method. 呼叫方法來判斷目前的主體是否為指定的角色。The method is called to determine whether the current principal is in a specified role. 宣告為基礎的模型會擴充使用宣告為主體所呈現的這項檢查。The claims-based model extends this check to use claims presented by the principal. A物件可以包含一或多個物件和身分識別的每個物件可以包含多個物件。A object can contain one or more objects and each identity object can contain multiple objects. 屬性會指定應該用來評估這時，角色提供值之宣告的宣告類型物件。The property specifies the claim type of the claim that should be used to provide the value for the role when evaluating this object. 屬性是設定建構函式。The property is set by the constructor. 常用的值是。A common value is .

returns.span: 如果已成功移除宣告，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the claim was successfully removed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很可能無法移除宣告，因為它不屬於身分識別。It is possible that the claim cannot be removed because it is not owned by the identity. 比方說，這就是主體所擁有的角色宣告的情況。For example, this would be the case for role claims that are owned by the principal. 物件參考所比對指定的宣告 ()。The specified claim is matched by object reference (). 這個方法有`SecurityCritical`屬性套用至哪些實體可以移除身分識別的宣告的控制項。This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can remove claims from the identity. 進一步向下管道，會做出授權決策基礎上會出現在宣告集合。Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the collection.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
